Package ES_23_24_1sem.LETI.Grupo_N

Class HTMLFileCreator

java.lang.Object
ES_23_24_1sem.LETI.Grupo_N.HTMLFileCreator
public class HTMLFileCreator extends Object
The HTMLFileCreator class provides methods to create HTML files for schedules and schedule evaluators.

  • Method Details

    • createSchedule

      public static File createSchedule(Schedule schedule) throws IOException
      Creates an HTML file for the given schedule.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The schedule for which the HTML file is created.
      Returns:
      The created HTML file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating the file.

    • createScheduleEvaluator

      public static File createScheduleEvaluator(LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> sMap, List<Boolean> userMetrics)
      Creates an HTML file for schedule evaluation based on user metrics.
      Parameters:
      sMap - A LinkedHashMap containing schedule information.
      userMetrics - A list of Boolean values representing user metrics for each schedule entry.
      Returns:
      The created HTML file for schedule evaluation.

    • write

      public static void write(File f, StringBuilder sb)
      Writes the HTML content to a specified file.
      Parameters:
      f - The file to which the HTML content is written.
      sb - The StringBuilder containing the HTML content.
